Package it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.lightPlayerRelated

Class LightHand

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.lightPlayerRelated.LightHand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Differentiable, Observed, Serializable
public class LightHand extends Object implements Differentiable, Observed
This class is a light version of the Hand class in the model of the user who own the view. It contains all the data the user can see about his hand such as the LightCard he has, the playability of each card Ã¹ and his own secret objective.

      The constructor of the class It initializes and populate the cardPlayability map and the card array with the given cards passed as parameter
      Parameters:
      cards - a map that contains the playability of each lightCard that the player has in his hand

      public void updatePlayability(LightCard card, Boolean playability)

      Parameters:
      card - the lightCard that need to have his playability updated
      playability - the new playability of the card

    • addCard

      public void addCard(LightCard card, Boolean playability)
      Add a lightCard to the card array and the cardPlayability Map At the end of the update the observers are notified
      Parameters:
      card - that need to be added
      playability - is a boolean that specified if the card is playable (true) or not (false)
      Throws:
      IllegalCallerException - if the player already has three lightCards in hand

    • removeCard

      public void removeCard(LightCard card)
      Remove a lightCard from the card array and the cardPlayability map At the end of the update the observers are notified
      Parameters:
      card - that need to be removed
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the card is not present in the card array
